overview: 1. Deep Purple - Smoke On The Water, 2.  George Benson - In Your Eyes,	3. The Legends (2) - Going Down Show, 4. Nile Rodgers & Chic - Le Freak,  5	. Gary Moore - The Stumble, 6. Joe Cocker - Up Where We Belong, 7. Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Tiger In The Spotlight, 8. Candy Dulfer - Lily Was Here, 9. Ladysmith Black Mambazo - Homeless, 10. Rory Gallagher - Tattoo´d Lady, 11. James Brown - Papa´s Got A Brand New Bag, 12. Johnny Cash - Ghost Riders In The Sky,  13. Earth, Wind & Fire – September, 14. The Jeff Healey Band - My Little Girl, 15. Youssou N'Dour	 - Shaking The Tree, 16. Otis Rush - Every Day I Have The Blues Featuring – Eric Clapton, Luther Allison, 17. Bonnie Raitt - Nothing Seems To Matter, 18. The Moody Blues - Gemini Dream. 19. Suzanne Vega – Luka, 20. Alice Cooper - School´s Out
title: Live At Montreux (Sampler)
